condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 1.5: The health system at all levels, families, and communities demonstrate strengthened commitment to the Polio Eradication Initiative.

description.narrative: Nigeria has completed more than three years without Wild Polio Virus, since the last polio cases was reported in August 2016 from the security compromised state of Borno. Certification of polio eradication is just around the corner, a tremendous accomplishment, not only for Nigeria but the entire Africa. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Existence of polio eradication and Endgame Strategic Plan (polio transition plan)
Children under 5 years missing polio vaccination due to refusal (Target: <1%)
